instruction: In a small bowl, mash avocado with a fork. Add lime juice, chopped onion, cilantro, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Place a tortilla in the skillet and sprinkle with half of the shredded cheese.
Top with another tortilla and cook for 1-2 minutes per side, or until golden brown and cheese is melted.
